text: Hello Jane.  I am indeed on the board of Animated Women UK.  We are a non-profit organisation with the aim of supporting and championing women in the VFX and animation industries.  We have about 130 members and run networking events and other workshops including something called the Achieve Programme which helps arm women to be successful.  You can find out more at <http://www.animatedwomenuk.com|www.animatedwomenuk.com> or follow us on twitter and facebook at @animatedwomenuk We also have instagram and a facebook group for young talent like you :slightly_smiling_face:
